changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.capability ( id bigserial NOT NULL, subject bigint NOT NULL, verb bigint NOT NULL, target_type int NOT NULL, target_entity bigint, target_resource bigint, target_location bigint, target_attribute bigint, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT capability_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT capability_subject_fkey FOREIGN KEY (subject) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_verb_fkey FOREIGN KEY (verb) REFERENCES ruleform.action (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_entity_fkey FOREIGN KEY (target_entity) REFERENCES ruleform.entity (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (target_resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_location_fkey FOREIGN KEY (target_location) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (target_attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT capability_valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(target_entity) + ruleform.null_zero(target_resource) + ruleform.null_zero(target_location) + ruleform.null_zero(target_attribute)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
